overview: Ahammed and Anna are friends from childhood and their parents are also good friends. Both of them who loved each other belonged to extremely religious families. One day, all of a sudden Ahammed decides to leave his native place without revealing many details and he asked Anna to forget him and move on. What happens post this incident is the main content of Bhoomiyile Manohara Swakaryam.
title: Bhoomiyile Manohara Swakaryam
